Name: Rose (by Johnny Milta)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Salmon-pink and wonderfully aromatic with dry vermouth and kirsch with a blast pf fruity redcurrant syrup.
History: Harry McElhone's 1922 Harry's ABC of mixing cocktails credits this cocktail to " Johny, Chatham Hotel Bar, Paris, 1919 " and is referring to a bartender called Johnny Milta. This recipe is adapted from David A. Embury 's 1948 The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks .
Nutrition: One serving of Rose (by Johnny Milta) contains 143 calories
